fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Kagura's Verity__
Easy best-in-slot as the weapon is fantastic when a character can fully utilize it which Yae has no problems doing as it was made for her.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__The Widsith__
Recommended budget option. Can be variable but the payouts with the buffs are much higher than alternatives

__Skyward Atlas, Solar Pearl, Lost Prayer, Oathsworn Eye__
All of these can be used additionally depending on what you have available

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK% |<goblet>  Electro DMG Bonus or ATK% |<circlet>  CRIT DMG or CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura
**2)** Elemental Burst: Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin
**3)** Normal Attack: Spiritfox Sin-Eater

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
2 Piece Thundering Fury over Atk% is mostly a question of subs. There's no major gain so if your Atk% Subs are really good, or you just don't want to farm Thundering Fury, all Atk% sets can fill in for it. 

Due to Kagura and Kazuha granting an excessive amount of Dmg Bonus, Atk% Goblet can be better than Electro Dmg % in Mono Electro comps.
